cleanDesc: Genuine BMW Exhaust Manifold Install Kit - E46 M3
Center Exhaust Section Installation Kit - E46 M54
short-description: Includes mounting hardware and gaskets. If you are installing a new front muffler on your BMW, you will need new gaskets and hardware. Over time, heat and road grime will cause your hardware to deteriorate, and should not be reused. This kit includes mounting hardware and gaskets. See kit contents tab for a list of included components

cleanDesc: Header Hardware and Gasket Kit - E46 M3
short-description: Includes longer studs for aftermarket headers! If you're swapping in new headers on your E46 M3 this kit of gaskets and hardware is the perfect finishing touch! Everyone knows that headers are one of the best performance gains you can do on the E46 M3 and we sell a lot of them. But new gaskets are required if you want a leak-free install and to avoid re-doing the work. This kit fits all E46 M3 (LHD only). Includes: 6 x 11627830667, manifold to head gaskets 18 x 11721437202, exhaust manifold nut 18 x 11121744057, exhaust manifold stud 2 x 11627830668, manifold to section 1 crush rings 1 x 11727505259, air pump valve gasket This item fits the following BMWs: 2001-2006 E46 BMW M3
